verses.verse: וַיְדַבֵּ֧ר <S%H1696><s%> vay-dab-Ber spake יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh And the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to מֹשֶׁ֥ה <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh unto Moses וְאֶֽל־ <S%H413><s%> ve-'el- and to אַהֲרֹ֖ן <S%H175><s%> 'a-ha-Ron and to Aaron לֵאמֹ֥ר <S%H559><s%> le-Mor saying אֲלֵהֶֽם׃ <S%H413><s%> 'a-le-Hem. about

דַּבְּר֛וּ <S%H1696><s%> dab-be-Ru Speak אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei unto the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El of Israel לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> le-Mor; saying זֹ֤את <S%H2063><s%> zot These הַֽחַיָּה֙ <S%H2416><s%> ha-chai-Yah [are] the beasts אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which תֹּאכְל֔וּ <S%H398><s%> to-che-Lu, which ye shall eat מִכָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> mik-kol all הַבְּהֵמָ֖ה <S%H929><s%> hab-be-he-Mah among all the beasts אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- are on הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz. that [are] on the earth

כֹּ֣ל׀ <S%H3605><s%> kol Whatever מַפְרֶ֣סֶת <S%H6536><s%> maf-Re-set Whatsoever parteth פַּרְסָ֗ה <S%H6541><s%> par-Sah, the hoof וְשֹׁסַ֤עַת <S%H8156><s%> ve-sho-Sa-'at making שֶׁ֙סַע֙ <S%H8157><s%> she-sa' cleft פְּרָסֹ֔ת <S%H6541><s%> pe-ra-Sot, hoofs מַעֲלַ֥ת <S%H5927><s%> ma-'a-Lat [and] cheweth גֵּרָ֖ה <S%H1625><s%> ge-Rah the cud בַּבְּהֵמָ֑ה <S%H929><s%> bab-be-he-Mah; among the beasts אֹתָ֖הּ <S%H853><s%> 'o-Tah תֹּאכֵֽלוּ׃ <S%H398><s%> to-Che-lu. that shall ye eat

אַ֤ךְ <S%H389><s%> 'ach Nevertheless אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- זֶה֙ <S%H2088><s%> zeh of these לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> lo are not תֹֽאכְל֔וּ <S%H398><s%> to-che-Lu, these shall ye not eat מִֽמַּעֲלֵי֙ <S%H5927><s%> mi-ma-'a-Lei of them that chew הַגֵּרָ֔ה <S%H1625><s%> hag-ge-Rah, the cud וּמִמַּפְרִיסֵ֖י <S%H6536><s%> u-mi-maf-ri-Sei or of them that divide הַפַּרְסָ֑ה <S%H6541><s%> hap-par-Sah; the hoof אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַ֠גָּמָל <S%H1581><s%> Hag-ga-mol [as] the camel כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for מַעֲלֵ֨ה <S%H5927><s%> ma-'a-Leh because he cheweth גֵרָ֜ה <S%H1625><s%> ge-Rah the cud ה֗וּא <S%H1931><s%> Hu, he וּפַרְסָה֙ <S%H6541><s%> u-far-Sah not the hoof אֵינֶ֣נּוּ <S%H369><s%> 'ei-Nen-nu does not מַפְרִ֔יס <S%H6536><s%> maf-Ris, but divideth טָמֵ֥א <S%H2931><s%> ta-Me he [is] unclean ה֖וּא <S%H1931><s%> hu he לָכֶֽם׃ la-Chem.

וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et הַשָּׁפָ֗ן <S%H8227><s%> hash-sha-Fan, And the coney כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for מַעֲלֵ֤ה <S%H5927><s%> ma-'a-Leh because he cheweth גֵרָה֙ <S%H1625><s%> ge-Rah the cud ה֔וּא <S%H1931><s%> Hu, he וּפַרְסָ֖ה <S%H6541><s%> u-far-Sah not the hoof לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> lo does not יַפְרִ֑יס <S%H6536><s%> yaf-Ris; but divideth טָמֵ֥א <S%H2931><s%> ta-Me he [is] unclean ה֖וּא <S%H1931><s%> hu he לָכֶֽם׃ la-Chem.

וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et הָאַרְנֶ֗בֶת <S%H768><s%> ha-'ar-Ne-vet, And the hare כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for מַעֲלַ֤ת <S%H5927><s%> ma-'a-Lat because he cheweth גֵּרָה֙ <S%H1625><s%> ge-Rah the cud הִ֔וא <S%H1931><s%> hi he וּפַרְסָ֖ה <S%H6541><s%> u-far-Sah not the hoof לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> lo does not הִפְרִ֑יסָה <S%H6536><s%> hif-Ri-sah; but divideth טְמֵאָ֥ה <S%H2931><s%> te-me-'Ah he [is] unclean הִ֖וא <S%H1931><s%> hi he לָכֶֽם׃ la-Chem.

וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et הַ֠חֲזִיר <S%H2386><s%> Ha-cha-zir And the swine כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for מַפְרִ֨יס <S%H6536><s%> maf-Ris though he divide פַּרְסָ֜ה <S%H6541><s%> par-Sah the hoof ה֗וּא <S%H1931><s%> Hu, thus וְשֹׁסַ֥ע <S%H8156><s%> ve-sho-Sa' making שֶׁ֙סַע֙ <S%H8157><s%> she-sa' cleft פַּרְסָ֔ה <S%H6541><s%> par-Sah, hoof וְה֖וּא <S%H1931><s%> ve-Hu he גֵּרָ֣ה <S%H1625><s%> ge-Rah not the cud לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- does not יִגָּ֑ר <S%H1641><s%> yig-Gar; yet he cheweth טָמֵ֥א <S%H2931><s%> ta-Me he [is] unclean ה֖וּא <S%H1931><s%> hu he לָכֶֽם׃ la-Chem.

מִבְּשָׂרָם֙ <S%H1320><s%> mib-be-sa-Ram Of their flesh לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> lo nor תֹאכֵ֔לוּ <S%H398><s%> to-Che-lu, shall ye not eat וּבְנִבְלָתָ֖ם <S%H5038><s%> u-ve-niv-la-Tam and their carcase לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> lo nor תִגָּ֑עוּ <S%H5060><s%> tig-Ga-'u; shall ye not touch טְמֵאִ֥ים <S%H2931><s%> te-me-'Im they [are] unclean הֵ֖ם <S%H1992><s%> hem like לָכֶֽם׃ la-Chem.

אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- זֶה֙ <S%H2088><s%> zeh These תֹּֽאכְל֔וּ <S%H398><s%> to-che-Lu, These shall ye eat מִכֹּ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> mik-Kol all אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher after בַּמָּ֑יִם <S%H4325><s%> bam-Ma-yim; of all that [are] in the waters כֹּ֣ל <S%H3605><s%> kol all אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- after לוֹ֩ lo סְנַפִּ֨יר <S%H5579><s%> se-nap-Pir whatsoever hath fins וְקַשְׂקֶ֜שֶׂת <S%H7193><s%> ve-kas-Ke-set and scales בַּמַּ֗יִם <S%H4325><s%> bam-Ma-yim, in the waters בַּיַּמִּ֛ים <S%H3220><s%> bai-yam-Mim in the seas וּבַנְּחָלִ֖ים <S%H5158><s%> u-van-ne-cha-Lim and in the rivers אֹתָ֥ם <S%H853><s%> 'o-Tam תֹּאכֵֽלוּ׃ <S%H398><s%> to-Che-lu. them shall ye eat

וְכֹל֩ <S%H3605><s%> ve-Chol all אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher that אֵֽין־ <S%H369><s%> 'ein- have ל֜וֹ lo סְנַפִּ֣יר <S%H5579><s%> se-nap-Pir And all that have not fins וְקַשְׂקֶ֗שֶׂת <S%H7193><s%> ve-kas-Ke-set, and scales בַּיַּמִּים֙ <S%H3220><s%> bai-yam-Mim in the seas וּבַנְּחָלִ֔ים <S%H5158><s%> u-van-ne-cha-Lim, and in the rivers מִכֹּל֙ <S%H3605><s%> mik-Kol all שֶׁ֣רֶץ <S%H8318><s%> She-retz of all that move הַמַּ֔יִם <S%H4325><s%> ham-Ma-yim, in the waters וּמִכֹּ֛ל <S%H3605><s%> u-mik-Kol all נֶ֥פֶשׁ <S%H5315><s%> Ne-fesh thing הַחַיָּ֖ה <S%H2416><s%> ha-chai-Yah and of any living אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher that בַּמָּ֑יִם <S%H4325><s%> bam-Ma-yim; which [is] in the waters שֶׁ֥קֶץ <S%H8263><s%> She-ketz they [shall be] an abomination הֵ֖ם <S%H1992><s%> hem like לָכֶֽם׃ la-Chem.

וְשֶׁ֖קֶץ <S%H8263><s%> ve-She-ketz They shall be even an abomination יִהְי֣וּ <S%H1961><s%> yih-Yu become לָכֶ֑ם la-Chem; מִבְּשָׂרָם֙ <S%H1320><s%> mib-be-sa-Ram of their flesh לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> lo may not תֹאכֵ֔לוּ <S%H398><s%> to-Che-lu, unto you ye shall not eat וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et נִבְלָתָ֖ם <S%H5038><s%> niv-la-Tam but ye shall have their carcases תְּשַׁקֵּֽצוּ׃ <S%H8262><s%> te-shak-Ke-tzu. in abomination

כֹּ֣ל <S%H3605><s%> kol all manner אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher does not אֵֽין־ <S%H369><s%> 'ein- have ל֛וֹ lo סְנַפִּ֥יר <S%H5579><s%> se-nap-Pir Whatsoever hath no fins וְקַשְׂקֶ֖שֶׂת <S%H7193><s%> ve-kas-Ke-set nor scales בַּמָּ֑יִם <S%H4325><s%> bam-Ma-yim; in the waters שֶׁ֥קֶץ <S%H8263><s%> She-ketz that [shall be] an abomination ה֖וּא <S%H1931><s%> hu he לָכֶֽם׃ la-Chem.

וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et אֵ֙לֶּה֙ <S%H428><s%> 'el-leh These תְּשַׁקְּצ֣וּ <S%H8262><s%> te-shak-ke-Tzu And these [are they which] ye shall have in abomination מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> min- among הָע֔וֹף <S%H5775><s%> ha-'of, the fowls לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> lo not יֵאָכְל֖וּ <S%H398><s%> ye-'a-che-Lu they shall not be eaten שֶׁ֣קֶץ <S%H8263><s%> She-ketz they [are] an abomination הֵ֑ם <S%H1992><s%> Hem; like אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַנֶּ֙שֶׁר֙ <S%H5404><s%> han-Ne-sher the eagle וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et הַפֶּ֔רֶס <S%H6538><s%> hap-Pe-res, and the ossifrage וְאֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et הָעָזְנִיָּֽה׃ <S%H5822><s%> ha-'a-ze-ni-Yah. and the ospray

וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et הַ֨דָּאָ֔ה <S%H1676><s%> had-da-'Ah, And the vulture וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et הָאַיָּ֖ה <S%H344><s%> ha-'ai-Yah and the kite לְמִינָֽהּ׃ <S%H4327><s%> le-mi-Nah. after his kind
אֵ֥ת <S%H853><s%> 'et כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- every עֹרֵ֖ב <S%H6158><s%> 'o-Rev Every raven לְמִינֽוֹ׃ <S%H4327><s%> le-mi-No. after his kind

וְאֵת֙ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et בַּ֣ת <S%H1323><s%> bat first הַֽיַּעֲנָ֔ה <S%H3284><s%> hai-ya-'a-Nah, and the ostrich וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et הַתַּחְמָ֖ס <S%H8464><s%> hat-tach-Mas and the night hawk וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et הַשָּׁ֑חַף <S%H7828><s%> hash-Sha-chaf; and the cuckow וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et הַנֵּ֖ץ <S%H5322><s%> han-Netz and the hawk לְמִינֵֽהוּ׃ <S%H4327><s%> le-mi-Ne-hu. after his kind

וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et הַכּ֥וֹס <S%H3563><s%> hak-Kos And the little owl וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et הַשָּׁלָ֖ךְ <S%H7994><s%> hash-sha-Lach and the cormorant וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et הַיַּנְשֽׁוּף׃ <S%H3244><s%> hai-yan-Shuf. and the great owl

וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et הַתִּנְשֶׁ֥מֶת <S%H8580><s%> hat-tin-She-met And the swan וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et הַקָּאָ֖ת <S%H6893><s%> hak-ka-'At and the pelican וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et הָרָחָֽם׃ <S%H7360><s%> ha-ra-Cham. and the gier eagle

וְאֵת֙ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et הַחֲסִידָ֔ה <S%H2624><s%> ha-cha-si-Dah, And the stork הָאֲנָפָ֖ה <S%H601><s%> ha-'a-na-Fah the heron לְמִינָ֑הּ <S%H4327><s%> le-mi-Nah; after her kind וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et הַדּוּכִיפַ֖ת <S%H1744><s%> had-du-chi-Fat and the lapwing וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et הָעֲטַלֵּֽף׃ <S%H5847><s%> ha-'a-tal-Lef. and the bat

כֹּ֚ל <S%H3605><s%> kol All שֶׁ֣רֶץ <S%H8318><s%> She-retz that creep הָע֔וֹף <S%H5775><s%> ha-'of, All fowls הַהֹלֵ֖ךְ <S%H1980><s%> ha-ho-Lech going עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- on אַרְבַּ֑ע <S%H702><s%> 'ar-Ba'; upon [all] four שֶׁ֥קֶץ <S%H8263><s%> She-ketz [shall be] an abomination ה֖וּא <S%H1931><s%> hu he לָכֶֽם׃ la-Chem. ס sa-Mek

אַ֤ךְ <S%H389><s%> 'ach Yet אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- זֶה֙ <S%H2088><s%> zeh these תֹּֽאכְל֔וּ <S%H398><s%> to-che-Lu, Yet these may ye eat מִכֹּל֙ <S%H3605><s%> mik-Kol all שֶׁ֣רֶץ <S%H8318><s%> She-retz creeping הָע֔וֹף <S%H5775><s%> ha-'of, of every flying הַהֹלֵ֖ךְ <S%H1980><s%> ha-ho-Lech thing that goeth עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- on אַרְבַּ֑ע <S%H702><s%> 'ar-Ba'; upon [all] four אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- which; לֹא lo כלֹ֤ו <S%H3808><s%> Lo not קכְרָעַ֙יִם֙ <S%H3767><s%> che-ra-'A-yim which have legs מִמַּ֣עַל <S%H4605><s%> mi-Ma-'al above לְרַגְלָ֔יו <S%H7272><s%> le-rag-Lav, their feet לְנַתֵּ֥ר <S%H5425><s%> le-nat-Ter to leap בָּהֵ֖ן <S%H2004><s%> ba-Hen withal עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- on הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz. upon the earth

אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- אֵ֤לֶּה <S%H428><s%> 'El-leh These מֵהֶם֙ <S%H1992><s%> me-Hem you תֹּאכֵ֔לוּ <S%H398><s%> to-Che-lu, [Even] these of them ye may eat אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הָֽאַרְבֶּ֣ה <S%H697><s%> ha-'ar-Beh the locust לְמִינ֔וֹ <S%H4327><s%> le-mi-No, after his kind וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et הַסָּלְעָ֖ם <S%H5556><s%> has-sal-'Am and the bald locust לְמִינֵ֑הוּ <S%H4327><s%> le-mi-Ne-hu; after his kind וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et הַחַרְגֹּ֣ל <S%H2728><s%> ha-char-Gol and the beetle לְמִינֵ֔הוּ <S%H4327><s%> le-mi-Ne-hu, after his kind וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et הֶחָגָ֖ב <S%H2284><s%> he-cha-Gav and the grasshopper לְמִינֵֽהוּ׃ <S%H4327><s%> le-mi-Ne-hu. after his kind

וְכֹל֙ <S%H3605><s%> ve-Chol all שֶׁ֣רֶץ <S%H8318><s%> She-retz creeping things הָע֔וֹף <S%H5775><s%> ha-'of, But all [other] flying אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- which ל֖וֹ lo אַרְבַּ֣ע <S%H702><s%> 'ar-Ba' which have four רַגְלָ֑יִם <S%H7272><s%> rag-La-yim; feet שֶׁ֥קֶץ <S%H8263><s%> She-ketz [shall be] an abomination ה֖וּא <S%H1931><s%> hu he לָכֶֽם׃ la-Chem.

וּלְאֵ֖לֶּה <S%H428><s%> u-le-'El-leh these תִּטַּמָּ֑אוּ <S%H2930><s%> tit-tam-Ma-'u; And for these ye shall be unclean כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- whoever הַנֹּגֵ֥עַ <S%H5060><s%> han-no-Ge-a' whosoever toucheth בְּנִבְלָתָ֖ם <S%H5038><s%> be-niv-la-Tam the carcase יִטְמָ֥א <S%H2930><s%> yit-Ma of them shall be unclean עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> 'ad- until הָעָֽרֶב׃ <S%H6153><s%> ha-'A-rev. until the even

וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> ve-chol and whoever הַנֹּשֵׂ֖א <S%H5375><s%> han-no-Se And whosoever beareth מִנִּבְלָתָ֑ם <S%H5038><s%> min-niv-la-Tam; [ought] of the carcase יְכַבֵּ֥ס <S%H3526><s%> ye-chab-Bes of them shall wash בְּגָדָ֖יו <S%H899><s%> be-ga-Dav his clothes וְטָמֵ֥א <S%H2930><s%> ve-ta-Me and be unclean עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> 'ad- until הָעָֽרֶב׃ <S%H6153><s%> ha-'A-rev. until the even
